template_data.quote: 'Tis "The Silver Road" (older: "Road of Silver") and, yes, traverses Silverymoon Pass. Also known to peddlers and dwarves as "The Nether Road" as it goes through The Nether Mountains.

document_data.name: The Silver Road
document_data.aliases:
Silverymoon Pass road
Road of Silver
The Nether Road
document_data.refs: {{Cite web|url=https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1305245247014875138|title=Tweet by TheEdVerse|date=2020-09-13|author=Ed Greenwood|format=Twitter|quote='Tis "The Silver Road" (older: "Road of Silver") and, yes, traverses Silverymoon Pass. Also known to peddlers and dwarves as "The Nether Road" as it goes through The Nether Mountains.}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Silver Road''' linked [[Silverymoon]] to [[Sundabar]] and was 165 miles long.

Starting at Silverymoon the road passed by [[Khelb]] before entering [[Silverymoon Pass]]. The road exited Silverymoon Pass at [[Auvandell]], and continued on to terminate at Sundabar. The road was patrolled by the [[Knights in Silver]], from Silverymoon, and by troops from Sundabar to stop monsters and bandits preying on the road's traffic.
